description: A blond-haired incubus (male counterpart to a succubus), Alphina is Carerra`s, Mercedes` and Rati`s boss. He usually stays behind in Hell to process the souls gathered into crystals, but can be summoned if no one else is there. The angels refer to him as the "White Devil". He is the only devil shown to be adept in combat, wearing a battle suit similar to the warrior angels.
name: Alphina
